overview: As a market analyst, I develop a research plan, analyze research results and offer marketing strategies. I meet with clients to ascertain their marketing goals. Then, I collect customer demographic information (e.g., gender, income, age) and market data (e.g., competition prices, distribution channels, industry sales) through primary research methods (such as questionnaires, surveys and focus groups) and secondary research (information from industry associations, statisticians and marketing experts). From this data, I generate reports that analyze customers, competition and the industry using charts, graphs and explanatory text. The reports offer insights to my client about product potential and marketing strategies…fun!
